author: cnbc.com
title: MDXG EQUITY ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Reminds Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of MiMedx Group Inc.
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether MiMedx Group Inc. (“MiMedx” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ:MDXG) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/MDXG-Info-Request-Form-1834 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On February 20, 2018, MiMedx announced that it will postpone the release of its financial results and Form 10-K filing for the year ended December 31, 2017. MiMedx said it has engaged “independent legal and accounting advisors to conduct an internal investigation into current and prior-period matters relating to the allegations regarding certain sales and distribution practices at the Company.” Following this news, shares of MiMedx were down more than 38% on intraday trading on February 20, 2018.
To learn more about the investigation of MiMedx contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/MDXG-Info-Request-Form-1834 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
